TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewHeaderRowPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GridViewRowPresenterBase

summary.span: 代表用來定義欄標題列版面配置的物件。

span.span: Represents an object that is used to define the layout of a row of column headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這物件和物件所支援的物件資料行中顯示資料的模式。This object and objects are support objects for the mode that displays data in columns for a . 如需有關如何定義檢視，請參閱[GridView 概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview.md)。For more information about how to define a view, see the [GridView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview.md). 您可以判斷資料行移至新位置藉由監視何時定義的事件。You can determine when a column is moving to a new location by monitoring the event that is defined for the . 您可以自訂資料行中的標頭所使用的屬性在這個類別和相關類別中所找到的各種檢視模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 如需有關這些屬性，以及它們之間的優先順序的詳細資訊，請參閱[GridView 資料行行首樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您實作這個類別的一部分檢視模式中，這個屬性的值會繫結至的值屬性上的。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 您可以自訂資料行中的標頭所使用的屬性在這個類別和相關類別中所找到的各種檢視模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 如需有關這些屬性，以及它們之間的優先順序的詳細資訊，請參閱[GridView 資料行行首樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 當您設定樣式時，適用某些限制。When you set styles, some restrictions apply. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see the [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *StyleResourceKey**StyleResourceKey* 識別所要求的樣式索引鍵。The key that identifies the style being requested. 索引鍵參考中的現有資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 屬性元素語法是技術上可行，但不是建議使用。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 請參閱[內嵌樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 繫結參考使用，或也是可行的但不常見。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers if they are displayed as strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果， ，或屬性設定時，會忽略這個屬性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 您可以使用數個屬性來指定資料行標頭的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果設定一個以上的屬性時，資料行標頭的格式與具有最高優先權的屬性值。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以數種類型上設定資料行的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 下列清單顯示可用來格式化資料行標頭，從最低到最高的優先順序排序的屬性：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性和同時設定了屬性，會優先使用。If the property and the property are both set, the takes precedence. 當您實作這個類別的一部分檢視模式中，這個屬性的值會繫結至的值屬性上的。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 您可以自訂資料行中的標頭所使用的屬性在這個類別和相關類別中所找到的各種檢視模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 如需有關這些屬性，以及它們之間的優先順序的詳細資訊，請參閱[GridView 資料行行首樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 類別衍生自實作實際覆寫。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 如需如何將您的自訂類別的對應資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和命名空間對應 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 識別選取器實作所要求的索引鍵。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 索引鍵參考衍生類別實作實際覆寫。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 如需如何將您的自訂類別的對應資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和命名空間對應 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 您可以也以程式設計方式新增的執行個體您類別作為資源字典中的資源。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您實作這個類別的一部分檢視模式中，這個屬性的值會繫結至的值屬性上的。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 您可以自訂資料行中的標頭所使用的屬性在這個類別和相關類別中所找到的各種檢視模式。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 如需有關這些屬性，以及它們之間的優先順序的詳細資訊，請參閱[GridView 資料行行首樣式和範本概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `toolTipContent` 成為的顯示文字的字串。A string that becomes the display text for the . `toolTipObjectContent` 要作為工具提示內容的物件。An object to use as the content for the tooltip. 一般而言，這個物件是或其他項目定義的配置，例如文字項目。Typically, this object is a or some other element that defines a layout for the , such as a text element. 這項用法中項目會以隱含方式建立的已剖析[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，而`toolTipObjectContent`內容設定為其屬性。In this usage, a element is implicitly created from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the `toolTipObjectContent` content is set as its property. <`ToolTip` .../><`ToolTip` .../> 請參閱 。See . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供 之 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料行移動到新位置時，就會發生事件，會取消此移動。If a event occurs while a column is moving to a new position, the move is canceled. 此實作不會處理事件。This implementation does not handle the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonDown(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonDown (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供使用者在 內按下滑鼠左鍵時發生之 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user presses the left mouse button inside a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，這個方法會準備資料行拖曳到資料行的標頭資料列中的其他位置。If is `true`, this method prepares a column to be dragged to another location in the column header row. 此實作會處理事件，藉由設定事件引數`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting the event argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonUp(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonUp (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供使用者在放開滑鼠左鍵時發生之 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user releases the left mouse button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`true`，而且如果資料行拖曳至新位置之後，就會發生事件，在移動的資料行。If is `true`, and if the event occurs after a column is dragged to a new location, the column is moved. 此實作會處理事件，藉由設定事件引數`true`。This implementation handles the event by setting the event argument to `true`.

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供使用者移動滑鼠時發生之 事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user moves the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`且使用者按下滑鼠左的按鈕，這個方法會實作發生於使用者拖曳視覺行為到新位置。If the property is set to `true` and the user presses the left mouse button, this method implements the visual behavior that occurs when the user drags a to a new location. 這個方法會覆寫設定事件引數`true`如即使使用者不會按下滑鼠左的按鈕的事件。This method override sets the event argument to `true` for the event even if the user does not press the left mouse button.
